solution_line_template: When her allowance is ${allowance_week_1} a week, Francie gets a total of ${allowance_week_1} * {weeks_1} = $<<{allowance_week_1}*{weeks_1}={money_phase_1}>>{money_phase_1}
When her allowance is ${allowance_week_2} a week, Francie gets a total of ${allowance_week_2} * {weeks_2} = $<<{allowance_week_2}*{weeks_2}={money_phase_2}>>{money_phase_2}
The total amount of money Francie gets is ${money_phase_1} + ${money_phase_2} = $<<{money_phase_1}+{money_phase_2}={total_money_saved}>>{total_money_saved}

After purchasing new clothes, she has ${total_money_saved} / {clothes_fraction_denominator} = $<<{total_money_saved}/{clothes_fraction_denominator}={money_after_clothes}>>{money_after_clothes} remaining
After buying the video game, Francie has ${money_after_clothes} - ${video_game_cost} = $<<{money_after_clothes}-{video_game_cost}={money_remaining}>>{money_remaining}
